sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND student.gender = '女' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”及 probe_samples 中唯一匹配值 '2022' 归一化为数值 2022
probe_samples 中存在 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班'，且其年级前缀与 grade=2022 一致；'计本一班' 是 '计算机科学与技术1班' 的常见简称，经规范化匹配唯一确定为该值
probe_samples 中 gender 候选值为 ['男', '女']，'女生' 规范化后精确匹配 '女'

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND student.gender = '女' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base
